name: 'Full House' Mania Online Trivia | Full House | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who did DJ have to choose between in the episode where a new member entered Jesse's new band?
questions.explanation:
Nelson and Viper.

	Viper and Nelson both tried to win DJ's heart but Viper won.

questions.text: Why was Jesse's and Becky's wedding delayed after jumping out of the plane?
What is the name of Michelle's bear?
questions.explanation:
Barney.

	When Michelle wanted to get into the big girls club Stephanie took down Barney The Bear.

questions.text: Who was wearing the mint coloured booties?
questions.explanation:
Nicky.

	When Rebecca sent Jessie to get Nicky she said, 'Nicky is the mint coloured booties and Alex is in the peach coloured booties."

questions.text: Why don't DJ, Stephanie and Michelle have a mom anymore?
options: they do but you never see her
got fired before they started taping
questions.explanation:
died in a car crash.

	Remember when Kimmy drank too much at a party. DJ was concerned because her mom got killed by a drunk driver.

questions.text: How did Michelle lose her memory?
options: hit her head against a wall
someone slipped something in her drink

questions.text: Who replaces Ranger Roy as Ranger Joe?
Who beats Joey in the pie eating contest?
How old is DJ when she begins dating Steve?
questions.explanation:
15.

	DJ began dating Steve at the beginning of season six. She celebrated her 16th birthday in the season six 20th episode "Grand Gift Auto", where Joey gets her car, only to find out it had been stolen!
